data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Ancient DNA can sometimes be amplified and sequenced which allows us to compare what species are more closely related on the evolutionary tree. This ____ for ____ revealed ____ Neanderthals ____ a ____ of ____ humans ____ became ____, ____ opposed ____ a ____ along ____ evolutionary ____. Molecular ____ can ____ be ____ experimentally ____ using ____ chemistry. This is done by creating a large random pool of molecules and selecting for a specific function.
data.partBlankContent: Ancient DNA can sometimes be amplified and sequenced which allows us to compare what species are more closely related on the evolutionary tree. This h__ for exa____ revealed th__ Neanderthals a__ a bra___ of mod___ humans th__ became ext____, a_ opposed t_ a st__ along t__ evolutionary li__. Molecular evol_____ can al__ be exam____ experimentally b_ using combin_______ chemistry. This is done by creating a large random pool of molecules and selecting for a specific function.
data.answer: 古代DNA有时可以被放大和测序，这让我们能够比较进化树上哪些物种关系更密切。例如，这表明尼安德特人是现代人类的一个分支，他们已经灭绝了，而不是沿着进化的路线走了一步。分子进化也可以用组合化学进行实验检验。这是通过创建一个大的随机分子池和选择一个特定的功能来完成的。
